sentences.en: Ammonia - air mixtures are quite difficult to ignite.
sentences.cn: 氨与空气的混合气体不易燃烧.

sentences.en: Ammonia has a pungent, penetrating odor.
sentences.cn: 氨具有一种强烈的刺鼻的气味.

sentences.en: Ammonia is a very reactive chemical.
Ammonium chloride under thermal dissociation forms ammonia and hydrogen chloride gases.
sentences.cn: 氯化铵在热力分解作用下形成氨和氯化氢气体.

sentences.en: Dilute the ammonia with water before you use it.
sentences.cn: 使用氨之前用水稀释它。

sentences.en: Glutamine rather than ammonia may be the preferential substrate.
sentences.cn: 谷酰胺可能是比氨还要合适的底物.

sentences.en: Hydrogen is used extensively in industry for the production of ammonia.
sentences.cn: 氢气在工业上广泛用于制氨。

sentences.en: In stock yards ammonia is formed by biological degradation.
sentences.cn: 在畜牧场,氨是由生物降解形成的.

sentences.en: Millions of tons of ammonia are consumed annually in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 在农业上每年要消耗成千上万吨的氨.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the effect of relative humidity on indoor concentrations of formaldehyde and ammonia.
sentences.cn: 目的观察相对湿度对装修后室内空气中甲醛和氨浓度的影响。

sentences.en: Tests of the manure showed a high ammonia content.
sentences.cn: 这种肥料经过化验表明氨的含量很高。

sentences.en: The amide nitrogen of glutamine or asparagine functions more effectively than ammonia.
sentences.cn: 谷酰胺或天门冬酰胺的酰胺氮作用较氨更有效.

sentences.en: The new plant was to have a capacity of 30 tons of ammonia per day.
sentences.cn: 这个新工厂的规模是日产30吨合成氨.

sentences.en: The nitrogen atom in ammonia, for example, vibrates 24 billion times a second.
sentences.cn: 例如, 氨分子中的氮每秒钟振动240亿次.

sentences.en: The red and white upper clouds are particles of frozen ammonia.
sentences.cn: 最上面的是红白色的、由冻结的氨粒构成的云。

sentences.en: The smelling of ammonia brought himaround.
There are four major steps in ammonia synthesis.
sentences.cn: 氨的合成主要经过四道工序.

sentences.en: They will react with ammonia to form amidines.
This precipitate dissolves in an excess of aqueous ammonia.
sentences.cn: 这个沉淀能溶解在过量的氨水中.

phrases.tran_cn: 氨水；氨溶液；阿莫尼亚溶液

trans.tran_en: a clear liquid with a strong bad smell that is used for cleaning or in cleaning products
